name: Keynote (Knilax)
description:
Just a quick game I made for my computer science club.

Songs:
It's Alright - Jack Stauber
Looking for Tracy Tzu - Carpenter Brut
Tech Noir (Carpenter Brut Remix) - Gunship
The Burbs - STRAFE OST (by ToyTree)
Shelter - Madeon and Porter Robinson
6:24 - Furi OST (by Danger)
Pepper Steak - OFF OST (by Alias Conrad Coldwood)
One 4 Galactus - OLDTV OST (by Omari Jazz)
Anarchy Road - Carpenter Brut
Turbo Killer - Carpenter Brut
Beware the Beast - Carpenter Brut
Bracket - Taitoki

Keys:
W/A/S/D or Arrows Keys
Enter/Space and Escape
F11 to toggle fullscreen

To play/record a custom song
Drag and drop an .ogg music file into the 'songs' folder. If the folder doesn't exist, either create it manually or launch the game.
